Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}

{3: 'The edge of the sky fades from the brilliance of daylight to a bright blue when the transport craft crosses the atmospheric boundary. In the direction from which the sunlight beams, the gem-like colors gradually spread to the horizon.'}

{3: 'With the drastic change in pressure and temperature, the small transport craft from Babylonia experiences brief tremors. Time and again, the passengers sitting in the aircraft can feel the jolts coming into the cabin through the anti-shock structure.'}
{3: 'At this moment, looking out the porthole, one could see the beautiful and fragile outline of the blue planet.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Never thought I'd see something so interesting leaving the atmosphere. Earth is quickly leaving us, while space is right at our hand. Seems like Babylonia has come a long way indeed in aerospace technology over the past few years.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I believe humanity will be able to escape the threat of the Punishing if we can go from orbital transport to interstellar travel in terms of our navigation technologyâ€”and when that happens, both the residents of Babylonia and Kowloong would benefit from it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Mankind will one day be able to reach all the stars out there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Or at least so I've always believed.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's not completely out of the question, I think.", 3: '14'}
{3: 'The aircraft shakes due to turbulence in the middle of your conversation with Qu.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'This thing has been shaking this entire time...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Can't really complain since this is a sightseeing craft.", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Babylonia sure knows how to treat their guests, huh.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'See, you could have taken care of this shaking situation had you gotten the engines swapped or added buffer plates.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yup, will do it next time.', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Are we still far from Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Almost there.', 3: '22'}
{3: "Qu's eyes narrow slightly as she gazes out the porthole, her mind impossible to read."}
{2: 'So, what brought you here this time?', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I thought it's because you invited me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You could have rejected me, you know.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I would have had the invitation come from Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I don't fancy the thought of hanging out with all these different factions, not to mention most of the meetings are pointless anyway.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Qu', 3: "Considering our past relationship, I couldn't think of a reason to turn you down, and I also wanted to personally explore Babylonia and see how life there differs from Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Mind being mind guide? I hope to have a reliable person by my side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll look forward to it, then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pressing her slender index finger against her head, Qu looks away from the window.'}
{3: 'Her casual gaze shifts to the table in front of her, where a pot of freshly brewed tea sits.'}
{3: 'After picking up the teapot, Qu swirls the hot water along the inner wall of the teapot before blending it with the tea leaves.'}
{3: 'Carefully, she tilts the teapot, allowing the tea to flow slowly into the delicate cup.'}
{2: 'Fancy some tea?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Unique habits are part of Kowloong's culture, too.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu takes leisurely sips from her teacup without saying anything.'}
{3: 'Rarely as relaxed as she is now, Qu gives off a composed and intellectual vibe.'}
{3: 'Right then, the aircraft encounters a change in air currents, causing another violent jolt.'}
{3: 'The entire cabin shakes violently.'}
{3: 'This time, however, you fail to predict and counteract the motion, and with it...'}
{3: "Qu's teacup tilts outward."}
{3: "The liquid inside splashes out and spills onto Qu's clothes."}
{3: 'With the fabric on her chest wet, Qu calmly sets down the teacup.'}
{2: 'Qu, are you okay?', 3: '57'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Focus. Keep your eye on the horizon and the level gauge.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Qu casts a glance at you before settling her eyes on the indicators on the aircraft's control panel."}
{3: "With Qu's reminder, you quickly check the monitoring panel. The aircraft's autopilot is working as it should, and the indicators are normal. There seems to be nothing to worry about."}
{3: "New Babylonia aircraft don't go haywire because of minor turbulence since they come with emergency safety systems."}
{3: 'When you turn back, you see that Qu has already placed a delicate towel over her chest.'}
{3: 'Wiping every inch of her clothes, she looks up with a frown, having noticed your gaze.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "We're probably going to go through that again if you keep getting distracted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So I heard you were a Chief at F.O.S.? Guess they totally overestimated you there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The first thing you checked on was me and not the aircraft itself right after that turbulence just now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Is that what they taught you guys at F.O.S.?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Or is it because you have a hard time taking your eyes off me?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Because you're our distinguished guest from Kowloong, Qu.", 3: '75', 4: "Because I'm your companion.", 5: '77'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Is that what's making you nervous?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "But don't sweat it, because I'm not here representing Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "That's straightforward of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm glad you're aware of that, though.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having been given a piece of mind by Qu, you turn to focus on piloting the aircraft.'}
{3: "Save for the engine's roar, the cabin has fallen completely quiet."}
{3: 'Qu crosses her legs casually, gazing at you as if she has something to say.'}
{3: 'But when you meet her gaze, she turns her head toward the porthole and starts admiring the view outside.'}
{3: 'This goes on a few more times, until Qu gets tired of this little hide-and-seek and decides to face you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I didn't come just to have a date with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Want to know what else I came to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Well, here is why.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Is that so? But you're supposed to familiarize yourself with the details of the mission you're on, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'In the interest of helping you stay on the ball, here is why.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So I got a physical letter about a month and a half ago from Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "And I was a little confused at first because I didn't remember writing physical letters being part of Babylonia's tradition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "But things started to make sense to me when I saw the sender's name.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Qu', 3: "The sender was Hengzhu, former administrator of Kowloong's observatory before the Punishing struck. He was as much a loyal subordinate of mine as he was my mentor, for giving me all sorts of suggestions on building Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I thought he'd died from the Punishing, but it turned out that he survived and moved to Babylonia. He works as an astronomer there now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But something hit me when I opened the envelope feeling relief.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'That Hengzhu should be quite old now in human years.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'And given that the letter came at this time, something came to my mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Knowing him and considering his pride, leaving Kowloong would have meant that he'd parted ways with his past.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "And that he'd never have swallowed his pride and written me this letter unless he was coming close to the end of his life.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'And it turned out I was right. The letter was a farewell letter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A farewell letter?', 3: '104'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'There used to be this tradition in Kowloong where people would write letters to their masters bidding farewell when they felt their days were numbered.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Hengzhu no longer lives in Kowloong, but he follows this tradition nonetheless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'It was clear from the letter that he had to put in a lot of effort writing it from his sickbed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'd like to pay him one last visit for old times' sake.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'And to avoid any diplomatic issues, I decided to visit him in a personal capacity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Keeping a low profile will save us both a lot of trouble. You understand that, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'This is Babylonia Air Traffic Control. You have entered our airspace. Please report your identification code.', 4: '18'}
{3: "The robotic voice interrupts my conversation with Qu. It came from Babylonia's communication AI."}
{2: 'Our temporary identification code is DWEQmu542KJ.', 3: '117'}
{2: 'Air Traffic Control AI', 3: 'Docking permission granted. Please enter the designated orbit and decelerate in 302 seconds.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Air Traffic Control AI', 3: 'Wishing you a pleasant journey. See you next time.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Are we there yet? I'm not feeling any turbulence anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yes, we've entered the designated orbit.", 3: '127'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading.jpg'}
{3: 'Once again, Qu looks out the porthole. Orbiting in sync nearby is Babylonia.'}
{3: "Up close, Babylonia's scale rivals that of a space fortress. Babylonia, in fact, does serve a similar purpose, too."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'So this is what you people call "home"? Spectacular indeed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'There is more to it than meets the eye.', 3: '134'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Is that so? Guess this trip is about to get exciting.', 4: '1'}
